item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is xander and I like cyber security, software development and servers. Currenlty I’m studying Bachelor Cyber Security at the IU International University of Applied Sciences. In my free time I like to bring interesting ideas to life, which mostly are never finished :D On the way to finish these projects I will at least write about them in this blog. Have fun!
